---
category: news
title: "Sonantic uses AI to infuse emotion in automated speech for game prototypes"
excerpt: "Sonantic has figured out how to use AI to turn written words into spoken words in a script, and it can infuse those words with the proper emotion. And it turns out this is a pretty good way to prototype the audio storytelling in triple-A video games."
